import React, { Component } from 'react'; import AddCourseForm from './AddCourseForm'; import EditCourseForm from './EditCourseForm'; import axios from 'axios' class AddCourseModal extends Component { constructor() { super() this.state = { } } saveCourse(course) { axios.post("http://localhost:8080/course/new", course).then(response => { let tempCourseList = this.props.courseList tempCourseList.push(response.data) this.props.updateCourseList(tempCourseList) }) } render() { const courseList = this.props.courseList return (

this.handleSearchChange(e.target.value)} type="text" className="form-control" id="inlineFormInputGroupUsername2" placeholder="Username" />

); } } export default AddCourseModal;
